notes: [Improved] Clean output buffer before streaming to prevent sending glitchy PDF to browser.
[Improved] Updated DOMPDF library files, resolving compatibility issues with PHP 7.2.
[Added] Added Twig extension to provide a `printmaker` global variable as a shortcut to `craft.printmaker`.
[Added] Updated docs with code examples for the `email()` method.

[Improved] Upgraded DOMPDF library to 0.7, which adds PHP namespace support, object-based Options config, initial support for SVG, updated fonts, optimized performance, Unicode support, better float support, and more.
[Added] DOMPDF dropped support for PHP 5.3, so **Printmaker now requires PHP 5.4+**
[Improved] Added the ability to set config options via a handy `config/printmaker.php` settings file.
[Improved] Enabled remote images by default, because basically everybody uses them.
[Added] Added the `PdfModel->email()` method for sending generated PDFs as email attachments.
[Improved] Added Craft 2.5 goodies, like a nice juicy updates feed. **Printmaker now requires Craft 2.5+**
